directions: Lay 1 slice bread on a plate. Place provolone cheese on bread and top with avocado and tomato slices, respectively. Drizzle balsamic vinegar over tomato and top with remaining slice of bread.
ingredients: 2 slices provolone cheese, or more as needed
1/4 avocado - peeled, pitted, and thinly sliced
title: Delicious Avocado Sandwich
